com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4

Interface ShellStreamer.ConnectionListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ShellStreamer

    public static interface ShellStreamer.ConnectionListener
    Listener interface that will provide notice about this streams connection state.
    See Also:
    ShellStreamer.addConnectionListener(ConnectionListener), ShellStreamer.removeConnectionListener(ConnectionListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onShellConnected(ShellStreamer shell)
      Called when a shell connection has been established
      void onShellDisconnected(ShellStreamer shell)
      Called when a shell connection has been closed or lost The ShellStreamer instance that called this method
